name: Pet Exorcism
description:
Pet Exorcism is a multiplayer game for two or more players.

One player will act as the pet's guardian and the other(s) will act as the exorcist. Work together to solve puzzles and save the guardian's beloved pet!  

Good luck, have fun, and happy exorcising! :D <3

*This game was created in 14 days for the "Virtual Pet" game jam created by team Dogpit.

________________________________________________________

Controls: 

Right Mouse Click = Fix Restraints/Chains

Right Mouse Click and Drag = Pet Dog

Left Click = All other actions (Pickup Items, Interact with objects)

Directional Pad = Move Crucifix
